text: John Roberts (born 22 December 1953) is a retired British rower who competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Roberts was part of the coxless pair with Jim Clark that won a silver medal at the 1977 World Rowing Championships in Amsterdam. At the 1980 Olympic Games he was selected by Great Britain to row in the men's coxed four, the crew finished in seventh place. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: John Roberts (rower)
